item.title: Amazing Trick: Discover How to Turn on Your Samsung Smart TV Without a Remote!
item.description: Introduction Are you looking for a way to turn on your Samsung Smart TV without a remote? Well, youâ€™re in luck! This amazing trick will show you how to turn on your Samsung Smart TV without a remote. Steps to Setting Up Your Samsung Smart TV Without a Remote Download the Samsung Smart TV Remote app from the App Store or Google Play. Connect your phone to the same Wi-Fi network as your Samsung Smart TV.
